definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: (form & meaning dub. v. infr.)—only in [[אֶרְאֶלָּם]] Is 33:7; Ges [[אַרְאֵלִם]] heroes; cf. Thes Kn Che; Hi [[אֲרִאֵלָם]]; cf. De, who der. from [[אֲרִיאֵל]], lit. = lion of God, coll. c. sf., & transl. their heroes; n.gent. fr. [[אֲרִיאֵל]] = Zion Nbr:Athen. 1886, p. 400 cf. Say:ib. 466; Ew [[אַרְאָל]] = [[אַרְעָל]] trembling, cf. Di. Brd prop. [[הילילו]] ‘cry pitifully.’ SyrVer Vulgate al. rd. some form of [[ראה]], LXX [[ירא]]. Wholly uncertain.
